message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to the game!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
Too low, I want a bigger share!
Meet me in the middle, but I'm still the smart one!
You're still high, I'm taking a slightly firmer stance
Still too low, I'm not backing down!
Getting closer to the sweet spot, but I'm not there yet!
Getting closer to a deal, but I still want more
Still too close to 50-50, I want to stay ahead!
Almost there, but I'm not quite ready to give up the reins!
I'm not budging, it's time to meet me in the middle
Still not good enough, I want to stay ahead!
Fine, meet me in the middle, but I'm not smiling!
